text.title: Fried Spring Rolls
text.description: These fried spring rolls are our kitchen's favorite. Made with a savory filling of pork belly, shrimp, and mixed vegetables, wrapped in a delicate rice paper wrapper and deep-fried to a crispy golden brown.

text.title: Pho
text.description: A classic Vietnamese noodle soup made with a rich and flavorful broth, made by simmering beef bones for hours. Served with your choice of tender sliced beef or chicken, and topped with a variety of fresh herbs and bean sprouts, this dish is a comforting and satisfying meal, perfect for any time of day

text.title: Banh Mi
text.description: A traditional Vietnamese delicacy, featuring a crisp baguette filled with a harmonious blend of succulent meats, fresh herbs, and pickled vegetables, finished with a subtle spread of mayonnaise. A symphony of flavors and textures, a perfect addition to any dining experience.
